name: Jumbo Shrimpin'
description:
AHOY!!

The main goal of Jumbo Shrimpin' is to catch as much as you can as a team!!

You can do this many ways whether using a fishing rod or steering your vessel over shrimp, though you may not get very far without the help of your team mates.

    A few things to try...

  • Use a fishing rod to catch a fish!
  • Use the compass to find shrimp
  • Turn on the motor and steer the boat over the shrimp
  • Reel in those shrimp with a friend!

Controllers needed to play!

Left stick / D-pad - Move

A Button - Pick up / Put Down / Interact

B Button - Push / Use Item

(Local co-op only, we recommend Parsec to play remotely!)

Credits:

3D Art/Animation/Concept - Brieyh'leai Simmons

Development/Programming - Nic Lupfer

2D Art/UI/Illustration - Ami Cai

Sound Design/Music - Joe
